title: Smoked salmon and walnut tagliatelle
ingredients: ['250g tagliatelle pasta', '50g walnuts, chopped', 'freshly chopped chives, to taste', 'freshly chopped dill, to taste', '80g smoked salmon, chopped', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
